price: Na wakumbuke waja wetu, Ibrahim na Is-haqa na Yaa'qubu walio kuwa na nguvu na busara.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ عِبَٰدَنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ أُوْلِي ٱلۡأَيۡدِي وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ
footnotes: Na mkumbuke mja wetu Ibrahim, na Is-haqa, na Yaa'qubu, wenye nguvu katika Dini na dunia, na wenye busara ya mwangaza.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur ʿibādanā ib'rāhīma wa-is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba ulī al-aydī wal-abṣāri
